Remarks: You need to enrol at the University of Copenhagen as a Merit student for course NFOK21003U. You should carefully revise the requirements for enrolment as merit student, well in advance as the deadlines are earlier than at DTU. For more information see here: http://www.science.ku.dk/uddannelser/andre-tilbud/meritstuderende/ In conjunction with your enrolment as merit student, you need to get an approval from your DTU study leader in advance. For more information contact your study leader at DTU.
